product_name: The North Face Alpine Project Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Alpine Project jacket for men from The North Face feels featherweight but you'll be knocked out by its heavy-duty performance. New Gore-Tex(R) Active reduces weight without sacrificing quality. Gore-Tex Active is 30% lighter than comparable Gore-Tex fabrics, meaning your load up to the summit can be lighter than you planned. The Alpine Project jacket is waterproof and seam-sealed but still extremely breathable for total comfort even during aerobic activity. Close-fitting hood easily adjusts with hidden cord locks; laminated brim adds protection and still fits comfortably under a helmet. 2 front zippered pockets help you secure your essentials and sit high on the torso for harness and pack compatibility. Underarm zippers allow for venting and better temperature control. The North Face Alpine Project jacket features nonabrasive adjustable cuff tabs and a hem cinch cord to block out the elements. The North Face Summit Series(TM) apparel is designed and tested for use in harsh conditions.
short_description: The Alpine Project jacket for men from The North Face feels featherweight but you'll be knocked out by its heavy-duty performance. New Gore-Tex(R) Active reduces weight without sacrificing quality.
